sections.label: Current symptoms or complaints (What is the patient reporting / what are you seeing?)

answers.label: Panic attack (sudden intense fear with somatic symptoms such as chest pain)
Trauma-related hallucinations (hearing voices associated with the traumatic event seeing dead persons as cultural expression of distress)
Problems with concentration memory or reasoning
Conduct problems in children (aggression/destructive behavior/ stealing /repeated lying/rule violation)

answers.label: Childhood behavioral disorder (incl. ADHD conduct disorder)

sections.label: Prioritize and write down the code of the three current symptoms or complaints (If current suicidal thoughts, recent suicide attempt, or current psychotic symptoms consider referral to psychologist /  mhGAP clinician)

sections.label: Past / precipitating events (possible reasons or causes linked to current problem)

answers.label: Highly stigmatizing disease (HIV/AIDS FHF cancer etc.)
Severe medical condition (malnutrition disability sexual or reproductive problems etc.)
Family member with a serious medical condition
Victim of human trafficking or smuggling
Family members lived a violent experience
Family member killed or missing (arrested / detained / disappeared)
Death of family member (natural or accidental death)
Natural disaster (earthquake tsunami flood hurricane etc.)
